name: Acosmart
0:
”Alexa, ask ayco smart to turn off bedroom light”
”Alexa, ask ayco smart to turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, ask ayco smart to dim bedroom light to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ayco smart
des:
We strive to make home smarter and more convenient. 
You can now voice control your home appliances, just simply say: 

On/Off
"Alexa, ask ayco smart to turn on bedroom light"
"Alexa, ask ayco smart to turn off bedroom light"

Brightness
"Alexa, ask ayco smart to dim bedroom light to fifty percent"

Color
"Alexa, ask ayco smart to set bedroom light to green"

Timer
"Alexa, ask ayco smart to turn off bedroom light after ten minutes"

Scene
"Alexa, ask ayco smart to set flash effect for bedroom light"

To get started:
1, You'll need a Optosun Light.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our Acosmart APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or Apple Store. 
After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
